testcase.classname: Search for vegetables and place order in the application.
testcase.name: Search for items and validate results.
testcase.system-out: Given User navigated to the GreenKart landing page..........................passed When user searched for "cucumber" vegetable.................................passed Then "Cucumber - 1 Kg" results are displayed................................passed
